column1: * [[Túrin]] arrives in [[Doriath]] and is welcomed by [[Thingol]] as a foster-son.<ref name="GA254"/>
* [[Morgoth]] sends a force to [[Brithombar]] and [[Eglarest]] which are subsequently destroyed, and [[Barad Nimras]] is cast down.<ref name="S">{{S
* [[Círdan]], [[Gil-galad]] and other survivors retreat to the [[Isle of Balar]] but keep a base at the [[Mouths of Sirion]].<ref>{{GA
* Círdan builds seven ships and [[Turgon]] sends them [[Valinor]] to ask for help. All are lost save [[Voronwë]], who is washed ashore in [[Nevrast]].<ref name="S" />
